body.name: INFANS 3 in 1 Baby Bassinet, Bedside Sleeper, Rocking Cradle, Easy Folding Portable Safer Co-Sleeping Crib with Height Angle Adjustable, Wheels Storage Basket Travel Bag for Infant Newborn (Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 9 hrs 34 mins.
features: 👶3 in 1 Convertible Mode: INFANS baby bassinet is available for 3 modes to meeting different needs of parents, including standalone baby bed, bedside sleeper and rocking crib. It is suitable for kids 0-6 months old and the max weight capacity for the baby bassinet is 20lbs.

🛏️Cozy Sleep Time: The soft cotton mattress included is breathable to offer a more comfortable sleep. With side zippered design and 2 included straps, the baby bassinet sleeper can be attached closely to the parent bed for baby feeding and interaction. Besides, this sleep bassinet can be switched to rocking cradle mode and shakes gently about 8°, which help parents to easily soothe the baby and get better sleep.

🍼Adjustable Height and Angle: With 7-level adjustable heights, the baby crib can be changed between 29’’ and 33.5’’ according to different height demands. Suitable for sofas, beds and other places. The angle of this bedside bassinet for baby can also be adjusted into 8° to prevent the baby from re-fluxing and spitting milk.

🏠Portable Folding Design: Requiring no tools, this bedside bassinet can be simply folded and put into the carry bag for easy transportation and storage while traveling. In addition, there are four universal wheels with brake making the portable crib for baby easy to move from room to room.

💗Attentive and Thoughtful Details: 2-side breathable mesh lets the air to circulate and parents can observe their babies at any time. The removable and machine gentle washable mattress is ideal for daily cleaning. In addition, there is a large detachable storage basket on the bottom to store baby items. The weight capacity of the basket is 33lbs.

🔒US. CPSIA & ASTM APPROVED: Made of non-toxic material without any odor, FREE from BPA, PVC, Phthalates, Lead, Latex, and Formaldehyde. No sharp points or edge. Passed the tests of stability, asphyxiation, load and shear.
body.description: Description: INFANS 3 in 1 baby bassinet can be used as a standalone baby bassinet, a bedside sleeper attached to the adult bed and a baby cradle, which can meet parents’ different needs. The zippers on the side are easy to open. And with 7 adjustable heights and removable legs design, this portable baby crib can closely attach to the parents bed within 29’’ and 33.5’’. And the adjustable angle about 8 degrees can prevent baby spitting up after feeding. The breathable mesh provides visibility for baby and parents can keep an eye on baby's status. Portable folding design structure is easy to disassemble into a compact size and this baby bedside sleeper is convenient to store and move with the carry bag. The four wheels with brake also make it easy to move around. Features: Soft removable mattress can be washed by machine gently Adjust the angle about 8° to prevent the baby from spitting milk 4 smooth universal wheels with brake let the baby crib easy to move Portable folding design for easy transport and storage with carry bag Swing about 8° under rocking cradle to help baby get back to sleep 3 in 1 convertible design for different needs, suitable for baby 0-6 months 2-side breathable mesh creates good ventilation that parents can observe baby's status 7-level adjustable heights design and removable legs let the baby bassinet easily attach to the bed Specifications: Net Weight:10 lbs Recommended Age: 0-6 Months Weight Capacity of the Crib: 20 lbs Weight Capacity of the Basket: 33 lbs Mattress Dimension: 32.5’’ x 20’’ (L x W) Material: Iron+PP+210D Oxford Cloth+300D Linen Overall Dimension: 38’’ x 25’’ x 29’’-33.5’’(L x W x H) Package Includes: 1 x Instruction 1 x Baby Bassinet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd buy it again!
reviews.reviewText: Love it already!!! The mattress seems to be very cushy and it can be removed in and out, there are velcro tabs on the bottom to keep it secure. A large bassinet sheet can easily fit on the matress for extra comfort... The frame is extremely sturdy and supportive. It was very easy to assemble the four 'leg" caps on each corner. I love that you can make it rock back and forth but also use it standing still without any motion. It is not quite as tall as I would like (I'm 5'10"), but it fits perfectly beside the bed for easy access. This also comes with an attachable mosquito netting which is super cool; but not sure I would want this for outside use!!?? Over all it is very nice 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet is very large. It looks very nice. The pieces to make it rock are kind of a pain so I’m not sure we’ll even use them. The height is good for having it next to bed. It doesn’t weigh a lot so it’s easy to carry to other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size bassinet
reviews.reviewText: A great little bassinet compared to others out there. I wanted a collapsible bassinet for space saving when not in use and this is perfect. It’s nice and big and holds way more weight than other bassinets so I will be able to use it longer. Love that it comes with the netting. I can use it outdoors if I want and no bugs can mess with the baby. The material is nice and I like the placement of the mesh. I can see right through and watch the baby sleep. There were a few things that I didn’t care for. The mattress has an imprint from where the baby’s head lays now after a month of use. It doesn’t bother him but just weird to me it would do that. With a sheet on the mattress the strap you pull to fold it down is covered causing me to have to pull the strap from underneath. When you have it folded the legs automatically slide in so you have to make sure you pop them both back out when folding back out. Also the parts you attach to make the bassinet rock are inconvenient. They don’t really stay on and you have to take them off to keep the bassinet from rocking. They don’t just lock to keep it in place. Which you cannot really take them off with the baby in it so we just don’t use them at all. Despite all the downfalls I do still really like this bassinet. The size and height outweigh the bad for me because I couldn’t find another bassinet comparable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my new born baby. It easy to install and break it up. Also convenient to move it around. I recommend it special for a small trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was a little worried due to it having only positive reviews, but wow! This bassinet is actually amazing quality. It is adjustable and sits right next to my bed! I don't have to leave bed to check on it feed my child. If you're looking for a bedside bassinet, just buy this one! We absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Esta muy bonita
reviews.reviewText: La cuna es muy bonita creo que será el regalo perfecto para mi próximo sobrinoNo tengo foto ya que será un regalo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bed ever for baby!!!
reviews.reviewText: It is so easy to use and fold away when not using! Light weight easy to carry around. Love it. I am a grandma and use it for all my grand babies!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love it. Its nice and big for your little one specially when they are getting bigger I should of got this a long time a go. Vary happy with it
